TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(object sender, SourceChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SourceChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SourceChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SourceChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SourceChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type SourceChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * SourceChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 引發事件並附加事件處理常式的物件。

span.span: The object where the event is raised, and the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示將在指定的接聽程式項目上處理 "SourceChanged" 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the "SourceChanged" event on specific listener elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派所代表的處理常式"SourceChanged"事件並未公開為公用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，在此情況下，使用最路由事件。The "SourceChanged" event that this delegate represents handlers for is not exposed as a public [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, as is the case with most routed events. 相反地，"SourceChanged"是路由的事件，所保留下來的私用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基礎結構，直接路由。Instead, "SourceChanged" is a routed event that remains private to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is direct routed. 因為它是直接路由，傳真`sender`而在事件資料永遠是相同的物件。Because it is direct routed, `sender` and the in the event data are always the same object. 您可以新增及移除此儘管事件本身的私用存取層級的事件處理常式使用的公用方法和。You can add and remove handlers to this event despite the private access level of the event itself by using the public methods and . `sender`的事件將會在衍生的類別的。The `sender` of the event will be a derived class of .
